meanings.definition: relating to or denoting a work of fiction that self-consciously addresses the devices of fiction
meanings.sent1: The metafictional story made me think about how stories are made up.
meanings.sent2: The book was metafictional, meaning it was aware of being a story.
meanings.sent3: The metafictional novel had characters who knew they were in a book!
meanings.sent4: Her writing style was so metafictional, it felt like the words were playing tricks on me.
meanings.sent5: The metafictional elements in the movie were so cleverly woven into the plot.
